options.name: Set Automatically
options.description: Automatically set based on resource and operation

options.name: Set Manually
options.description: Manually set the description

properties.name: toolDescription
properties.description: Explain to the LLM what this tool does, a good, specific description would allow LLMs to produce expected results much more often

options.name: Get
options.description: Get up to date information about a chat

options.description: Set the description of a chat

options.description: Set the title of a chat

options.description: Send answer to callback query sent from inline bot

options.description: Get a file

properties.name: chatId
properties.description: Unique identifier for the target chat or username, To find your chat ID ask @get_id_bot

properties.name: messageId
properties.description: Unique identifier of the message to delete

properties.name: messageId
properties.description: Unique identifier of the message to pin or unpin

options.name: disable_notification
options.description: Whether to send a notification to all chat members about the new pinned message

properties.name: userId
properties.description: Unique identifier of the target user

properties.name: description
properties.description: New chat description, 0-255 characters

properties.name: title
properties.description: New chat title, 1-255 characters

properties.name: queryId
properties.description: Unique identifier for the query to be answered

options.name: cache_time
options.description: The maximum amount of time in seconds that the result of the callback query may be cached client-side

options.name: show_alert
options.description: Whether an alert will be shown by the client instead of a notification at the top of the chat screen

options.name: text
options.description: Text of the notification. If not specified, nothing will be shown to the user, 0-200 characters.

options.name: url
options.description: URL that will be opened by the user's client

properties.name: queryId
properties.description: Unique identifier for the answered query

properties.name: results
properties.description: A JSON-serialized array of results for the inline query

options.name: cache_time
options.description: The maximum amount of time in seconds that the result of the callback query may be cached client-side

options.name: show_alert
options.description: Whether an alert will be shown by the client instead of a notification at the top of the chat screen

options.name: text
options.description: Text of the notification. If not specified, nothing will be shown to the user, 0-200 characters.

options.name: url
options.description: URL that will be opened by the user's client

properties.name: fileId
properties.description: The ID of the file

properties.name: download
properties.description: Whether to download the file

properties.name: messageType
properties.description: The type of the message to edit

properties.name: chatId
properties.description: Unique identifier for the target chat or username, To find your chat ID ask @get_id_bot

properties.name: binaryData
properties.description: Whether the data to upload should be taken from binary field

properties.name: binaryPropertyName
properties.hint: The name of the input binary field containing the file to be written
properties.description: Name of the binary property that contains the data to upload

properties.name: messageId
properties.description: Unique identifier of the message to edit

properties.name: inlineMessageId
properties.description: Unique identifier of the inline message to edit

properties.name: replyMarkup
properties.description: Additional interface options

properties.name: file
properties.description: Animation to send. Pass a file_id to send an animation that exists on the Telegram servers (recommended), an HTTP URL for Telegram to get an animation from the Internet.

properties.name: file
properties.description: Audio file to send. Pass a file_id to send a file that exists on the Telegram servers (recommended), an HTTP URL for Telegram to get a file from the Internet.

properties.name: action
properties.description: Type of action to broadcast. Choose one, depending on what the user is about to receive. The status is set for 5 seconds or less (when a message arrives from your bot).

properties.name: file
properties.description: Document to send. Pass a file_id to send a file that exists on the Telegram servers (recommended), an HTTP URL for Telegram to get a file from the Internet.

properties.name: latitude
properties.description: Location latitude

properties.name: longitude
properties.description: Location longitude

properties.name: media
properties.description: The media to add

values.name: type
values.description: The type of the media to add

values.name: media
values.description: Media to send. Pass a file_id to send a file that exists on the Telegram servers (recommended) or pass an HTTP URL for Telegram to get a file from the Internet.

options.name: caption
options.description: Caption text to set, 0-1024 characters

options.name: parse_mode
options.description: How to parse the text

properties.name: text
properties.description: Text of the message to be sent

properties.name: file
properties.description: Photo to send. Pass a file_id to send a photo that exists on the Telegram servers (recommended), an HTTP URL for Telegram to get a photo from the Internet.

properties.name: file
properties.description: Sticker to send. Pass a file_id to send a file that exists on the Telegram servers (recommended), an HTTP URL for Telegram to get a .webp file from the Internet.

properties.name: file
properties.description: Video file to send. Pass a file_id to send a file that exists on the Telegram servers (recommended), an HTTP URL for Telegram to get a file from the Internet.

properties.name: replyMarkup
properties.description: Additional interface options

options.name: force_reply
options.description: Whether to show reply interface to the user, as if they manually selected the bot‘s message and tapped ’Reply

options.name: selective
options.description: Whether to force reply from specific users only

properties.name: inlineKeyboard
properties.description: Adds an inline keyboard that appears right next to the message it belongs to

values.name: row
values.description: The value to set

values.name: text
values.description: Label text on the button

options.name: callback_data
options.description: Data to be sent in a callback query to the bot when button is pressed, 1-64 bytes

options.name: pay
options.description: Whether to send a Pay button

options.name: switch_inline_query_current_chat
options.description: If set, pressing the button will insert the bot‘s username and the specified inline query in the current chat's input field.Can be empty, in which case only the bot’s username will be inserted

options.name: switch_inline_query
options.description: If set, pressing the button will prompt the user to select one of their chats, open that chat and insert the bot‘s username and the specified inline query in the input field. Can be empty, in which case just the bot’s username will be inserted.

options.name: url
options.description: HTTP or tg:// URL to be opened when button is pressed

options.name: web_app
url
options.description: An HTTPS URL of a Web App to be opened
Launch the Telegram Web App

properties.name: replyKeyboard
properties.description: Adds a custom keyboard with reply options

values.name: row
values.description: The value to set

values.name: text
values.description: Text of the button. If none of the optional fields are used, it will be sent as a message when the button is pressed.

options.name: request_contact
options.description: Whether the user's phone number will be sent as a contact when the button is pressed.Available in private chats only

options.name: request_location
options.description: Whether the user's request_location

options.name: web_app
url
options.description: An HTTPS URL of a Web App to be opened
Launch the Telegram Web App

options.name: resize_keyboard
options.description: Whether to request clients to resize the keyboard vertically for optimal fit

options.name: one_time_keyboard
options.description: Whether to request clients to hide the keyboard as soon as it's been used

options.name: selective
options.description: Whether to show the keyboard to specific users only

options.name: remove_keyboard
options.description: Whether to request clients to remove the custom keyboard

options.name: selective
options.description: Whether to force reply from specific users only

options.name: appendAttribution
options.description: Whether to include the phrase “This message was sent automatically with n8n” to the end of the message

options.name: caption
options.description: Caption text to set, 0-1024 characters

options.name: disable_notification
options.description: Whether to send the message silently. Users will receive a notification with no sound.

options.name: disable_web_page_preview
options.description: Whether to disable link previews for links in this message

options.name: duration
options.description: Duration of clip in seconds

options.name: height
options.description: Height of the video

options.name: parse_mode
options.description: How to parse the text

options.name: performer
options.description: Name of the performer

options.name: reply_to_message_id
options.description: If the message is a reply, ID of the original message

options.name: message_thread_id
options.description: The unique identifier of the forum topic

options.name: title
options.description: Title of the track

options.name: thumb
options.description: Thumbnail of the file sent; can be ignored if thumbnail generation for the file is supported server-side. The thumbnail should be in JPEG format and less than 200 kB in size. A thumbnail‘s width and height should not exceed 320.

options.name: width
options.description: Width of the video

properties.name: chatId
properties.description: Unique identifier for the target chat or username of the target channel (in the format @channelusername). To find your chat ID ask @get_id_bot.

options.name: Approval
options.description: User can approve/disapprove from within the message

options.name: Free Text
options.description: User can submit a response via a form

options.name: Custom Form
options.description: User can submit a response via a custom form

values.name: fieldLabel
values.description: Label that appears above the input field

values.name: fieldType
values.description: The type of field to add to the form

values.name: elementName
values.description: Optional field. It can be used to include the html in the output.

values.name: placeholder
values.description: Sample text to display inside the field

values.name: fieldName
values.description: The name of the field, used in input attributes and referenced by the workflow

values.name: fieldValue
values.description: Input value can be set here or will be passed as a query parameter via Field Name if no value is set

values.name: fieldOptions
values.description: List of options that can be selected from the dropdown

values.name: multiselect
values.description: Whether to allow the user to select multiple options from the dropdown list

values.name: html
values.description: HTML elements to display on the form page

values.name: multipleFiles
values.description: Whether to allow the user to select multiple files from the file input or just one

values.name: acceptFileTypes
values.description: Comma-separated list of allowed file extensions
values.hint: Leave empty to allow all file types

values.displayName: The displayed date is formatted based on the locale of the user's browser
values.name: formatDate
requiredField
values.description: Whether to require the user to enter a value for this field before submitting the form

options.name: limitWaitTime
options.description: Whether the workflow will automatically resume execution after the specified limit type

values.name: limitType
values.description: Sets the condition for the execution to resume. Can be a specified date or after some time.

options.name: After Time Interval
options.description: Waits for a certain amount of time

options.name: At Specified Time
options.description: Waits until the set date and time to continue

values.name: resumeAmount
values.description: The time to wait

values.name: resumeUnit
values.description: Unit of the interval value

values.name: maxDateAndTime
values.description: Continue execution after the specified date and time

options.name: appendAttribution
options.description: Whether to include the phrase "This message was sent automatically with n8n" to the end of the message

options.name: responseFormTitle
options.description: Title of the form that the user can access to provide their response

options.name: responseFormDescription
options.description: Description of the form that the user can access to provide their response

options.description: Whether the workflow will automatically resume execution after the specified limit type

values.name: limitType
values.description: Sets the condition for the execution to resume. Can be a specified date or after some time.
